typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	PathWildcard as string ('Ventas')
}
source(output(
		IDVentas as short,
		FechaVenta as string,
		NumFactura as string,
		DNICliente as integer,
		Importe as string,
		IDItem as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	wildcardPaths:[($PathWildcard +'*.csv')],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> fuenteVentasCSV
fuenteVentasCSV derive(FechaVentaModif = coalesce(toDate(FechaVenta,'MM/dd/yyyy'),toDate(FechaVenta,'yyyy/MM/dd'),toDate(FechaVenta,'dd/MM/yyyy'),toDate(FechaVenta,'MMddyyyy'),toDate(FechaVenta,'yyyyddMM'),toDate(FechaVenta,'MMddyyyy'),toDate(FechaVenta,'yyyyMMdd'))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:(concat('Ventas','_', toString(currentDate()))),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		IDVentas,
		FechaVenta = FechaVentaModif,
		DNICliente,
		Importe,
		IDItem,
		NumFactura
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkVentasCSV
